{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00463v1", "title": "Complete quasi-Yamabe gradient solitons with bounded scalar curvature", "summary": "In this paper, we classify complete, nontrivial shrinking and steady
quasi-Yamabe gradient solitons whose scalar curvature is bounded below by the
soliton constant. We also classify complete, nontrivial expanding and steady
quasi-Yamabe gradient solitons whose scalar curvature is bounded above by the
soliton constant.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-05-01T11:30:17Z"}
